items.title: Dark Avengers’ Global Bounty
items: Win games using any of the designated Dark Avengers-themed cards: Iron Patriot, Victoria Hand, Moonstone, Luke Cage, U.S. Agent, Daken, Devil Dinosaur
8M Wins - Premium Mystery Variant
10M Wins - 3x Snowflake Red Borders
15M Wins - Exclusive Knull Variant
20M Wins - Exclusive X-23 Variant

items.title: Collector's Vault
items: Exclusive variants available again for a limited time!

items.name: Scream
changes: 2/3 - When an enemy card moves, steal 2 Power from it. (once per turn)

items.name: Spider-Man
changes: 3/5 - On Reveal: Move to another location and pull an enemy card from here to there.

items.name: Luke Cage
changes: 3/3 - Ongoing: Your cards can’t have their Power reduced.

items.name: U.S. Agent
changes: 2/3 - Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -4 Power.
2/3 - Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -3 Power.

items.name: Ka-Zar
changes: 4/4 - Ongoing: Your 1-Cost cards have +1 Power.

items.name: Hydra Bob
changes: 1/5 - After each turn, this moves if a player Snapped.

items.name: Sentry
changes: 4/8 - You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -8 Power Void to the right location.
4/9 - You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -9 Power Void to the right location

items.name: Onslaught
changes: 6/7 - Ongoing: Double your other Ongoing effects here.

items.name: Mister Fantastic
changes: 3/2 - Ongoing: Adjacent locations have +2 Power.
3/1 - Ongoing: Adjacent locations have +3 Power.

items.name: Hela
changes: 6/7 - On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded to random locations with -3 Power.
6/9 - On Reveal: For each different Cost among them, resurrect a card you discarded to a random location.

items.name: Dagger
changes: 2/0 - When this moves to a location, +3 Power for each enemy card there.
2/2 - When this moves to a location, +2 Power for each enemy card there.

items.name: Araña
changes: 1/1 - Activate: Give the next card you play +2 Power and move it to the right.
1/2 - Activate: Give the next card you play +1 Power and move it to the right.

items.name: Spectrum
changes: 6/6 - On Reveal: Give your Ongoing cards +2 Power.

items.name: Namora
changes: 5/6 - On Reveal: Give +5 Power to each of your cards alone at another location.

items.name: Leader
changes: 6/3 - On Reveal: Copy the enemy card(s) with the highest Power played this turn, but on your side.

items.name: Sandman
changes: 5/7 - On Reveal: Next turn, cards cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

items.name: Ms. Marvel
changes: Ongoing: Your adjacent locations with 2+ cards and no repeated Costs have +5 Power.

items.name: Luna Snow
changes: 3/5 - On Reveal: Add an Ice Cube to each side of this location.
